message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of mitigating interference in multiantenna wireless networks using spatial interference avoidance. This is a problem in the field of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper proposes a method of distributive control that adapts feedback to channel dynamics, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY). The paper also uses stochastic optimization theory, which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.MM) and statistics (cs.LG). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IT, followed by cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, and cs.LG.
